attributes.description: The Brand New Isuzu D-MAX 1.9 Automatic Diesel bakkie is here with a fresh new exterior design as well as a new and improved cabin with modern looks. This Demo model comes fitted with Tow-Bar, Nudge-Bar and Roll-Bar and Canopy making it an excellent option. Inquire today for a test drive and drive away smiling.  Quick and easy Finance available, Trade in vehicles welcome, Nation-wide delivery available, excludes Admin and service Fees T/C's apply.
